168 static int32_t CFARCADSP_configEDMADopplerDomain
169 (
170  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_HW_Resources *pRes,
171  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_StaticConfig *staticCfg
172 )
173 {
174  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
175  DPEDMA_syncACfg syncACfg;
176 
177  /* Common EDMA setting between ping and pong */
178  syncACfg.aCount = staticCfg->numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t);
179  syncACfg.bCount = (staticCfg->numRangeBins) /2;
180  syncACfg.srcBIdx = syncACfg.aCount * 2;
181  syncACfg.dstBIdx = 0;
182 
183  /* Ping source and destination setting */
184  syncACfg.srcAddress = (uint32_t)pRes->detMatrix.data;
185  syncACfg.destAddress = (uint32_t)pRes->localDetMatrixBuffer;
186 
187  errorCode = DPEDMA_configSyncA_singleFrame(pRes->edmaHandle,
188  &pRes->edmaInPing,
189  NULL,
190  &syncACfg,
191  false, //isEventTriggered
192  true,//isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled
193  true,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
194  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
195  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
196  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
197  {
198  goto exit;
199  }
200 
201  /* Pong source and destination setting */
202  syncACfg.srcAddress = (uint32_t)pRes->detMatrix.data + syncACfg.aCount;
203  syncACfg.destAddress = (uint32_t)pRes->localDetMatrixBuffer + syncACfg.aCount;
204  syncACfg.bCount = (staticCfg->numRangeBins)/2;
205 
206  errorCode = DPEDMA_configSyncA_singleFrame(pRes->edmaHandle,
207  &pRes->edmaInPong,
208  NULL,
209  &syncACfg,
210  false, //isEventTriggered
211  true,//isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled
212  true,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
213  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
214  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
215  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
216  {
217  goto exit;
218  }
219 
220 exit:
221  return(errorCode);
222 }
223 
244 static int32_t CFARCADSP_configEDMARangeDomain
245 (
246  EDMA_Handle edmaHandle,
247  DPEDMA_ChanCfg *pEdmaChan,
248  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_StaticConfig *staticCfg,
249  uint32_t srcAddr,
250  uint32_t dstAddr
251 )
252 {
253  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
254  DPEDMA_syncABCfg syncABCfg;
255 
256  syncABCfg.aCount = sizeof(uint16_t);
257  syncABCfg.bCount = staticCfg->numRangeBins;
258  syncABCfg.cCount = 1;
259  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint16_t) * staticCfg->numDopplerBins;
260  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);
261  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = 0;
262  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = 0;
263 
264  syncABCfg.srcAddress = srcAddr;
265  syncABCfg.destAddress = dstAddr;
266 
267  errorCode = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(edmaHandle,
268  pEdmaChan,
269  NULL,
270  &syncABCfg,
271  false, //isEventTriggered
272  true,//isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled
273  true,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
274  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
275  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
276  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
277  {
278  goto exit;
279  }
280 
281 exit:
282  return(errorCode);
283 }

300 static void CFARCADSP_waitEDMATransComplete
301 (
302  EDMA_Handle edmaHandle,
303  uint8_t chId
304 )
305 {
306  volatile bool isTransferDone;
307  do {
308  if (EDMA_isTransferComplete(edmaHandle,
309  (uint8_t) chId,
310  (bool *)&isTransferDone) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
311  {
312  }
313  } while (isTransferDone == false);
314 }

329 static void CFARCADSP_adjustCfarCfg
330 (
331  DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg *pCfarCfg
332 )
333 {
334  if (pCfarCfg->averageMode != 0)//cfar so, or go
335  {
336  /* For CAGO and CASO mode, lib function CFARCADSP_cfarCadB_SOGO expects
337  * noiseDivShift to be specified for both left and right window whereas
338  * IOCTL structure expects noiseDivShift to be specified for one side only.
339  * Hence increment the shift by 1.
340  */
341  pCfarCfg->noiseDivShift = pCfarCfg->noiseDivShift + 1;
342  }
343 }

361 static void CFARCADSP_fovConvertRange
362 (
363  DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg *fovRangeCfg,
364  float rangeStep,
365  DPU_CFARCAProc_FovIdxCfg *fovRangeIdxCfg
366 )
367 {
368  fovRangeIdxCfg->minIdx = (int16_t) (fovRangeCfg->min / rangeStep + 0.5);
369  fovRangeIdxCfg->maxIdx = (int16_t) (fovRangeCfg->max / rangeStep + 0.5);
370 }

388 static void CFARCADSP_fovConvertDoppler
389 (
390  DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg *fovDopplerCfg,
391  float dopplerStep,
392  DPU_CFARCAProc_FovIdxCfg *fovDopplerIdxCfg
393 )
394 {
395  float doppler;
396 
397  doppler = (fovDopplerCfg->min / dopplerStep);
398  if (doppler < 0.)
399  {
400  doppler -= .5;
401  }
402  else
403  {
404  doppler += .5;
405 
406  }
407  fovDopplerIdxCfg->minIdx = (int16_t) doppler;
408 
409  doppler = (fovDopplerCfg->max / dopplerStep);
410  if (doppler < 0.)
411  {
412  doppler -= .5;
413  }
414  else
415  {
416  doppler += .5;
417 
418  }
419  fovDopplerIdxCfg->maxIdx = (int16_t) doppler;
420 }

435 static void CFARCADSP_saveConfiguration
436 (
437  CFARCADspObj * cfarDspObj,
438  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Config *cfarDspCfg
439 )
440 {
441  cfarDspObj->staticCfg = cfarDspCfg->staticCfg;
442  cfarDspObj->res = cfarDspCfg->res;
443  cfarDspObj->cfarCfgDoppler = *cfarDspCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgDoppler;
444  cfarDspObj->cfarCfgRange = *cfarDspCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgRange;
445  cfarDspObj->staticCfg = cfarDspCfg->staticCfg;
446 
447  CFARCADSP_fovConvertDoppler(cfarDspCfg->dynCfg.fovDoppler,
448  cfarDspObj->staticCfg.dopplerStep,
449  &cfarDspObj->fovDoppler);
450 
451  CFARCADSP_fovConvertRange(cfarDspCfg->dynCfg.fovRange,
452  cfarDspObj->staticCfg.rangeStep,
453  &cfarDspObj->fovRange);
454  CFARCADSP_adjustCfarCfg(&cfarDspObj->cfarCfgRange);
455  CFARCADSP_adjustCfarCfg(&cfarDspObj->cfarCfgDoppler);
456 }

475 static bool CFARCADSP_isObjectDetectedOnDopplerLine
476 (
477  uint32_t dopplerIdx,
478  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
479  uint32_t numRangeBins,
480  uint32_t *cfarDetOutBitMask
481 )
482 {
483  uint32_t bit, word;
484  uint32_t bitIndex;
485  uint32_t rangeIdx;
486  bool detected = false;
487 
488  for(rangeIdx = 0; rangeIdx < numRangeBins;rangeIdx++)
489  {
490  bitIndex = rangeIdx * numDopplerBins + dopplerIdx;
491  word = bitIndex >> 5;
492  bit = bitIndex & 31;
493  if (cfarDetOutBitMask[word] & (1 << bit))
494  {
495  detected = true;
496  break;
497  }
498  }
499  return(detected);
500 }
501 
519 static bool CFARCADSP_isObjectDetected
520 (
521  uint32_t rangeIdx,
522  uint32_t dopplerIdx,
523  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
524  uint32_t *cfarDetOutBitMask
525 )
526 {
527  uint32_t bit, word;
528  uint32_t bitIndex;
529  bool detected = false;
530 
531  bitIndex = rangeIdx * numDopplerBins + dopplerIdx;
532  word = bitIndex >> 5;
533  bit = bitIndex & 31;
534  if (cfarDetOutBitMask[word] & (1 << bit))
535  {
536  detected = true;
537  }
538  return(detected);
539 }

557 static void CFARCADSP_setCfarDetMaskLine
558 (
559  uint32_t rangeInd,
560  uint32_t dopplerInd,
561  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
562  uint32_t *cfarDetOutBitMask
563 )
564 {
565  uint32_t word;
566  uint32_t bit;
567  uint32_t bitIndex;
568 
569  bitIndex = rangeInd * numDopplerBins + dopplerInd;
570  word = bitIndex >> 5;
571  bit = bitIndex & 31;
572 
573  cfarDetOutBitMask[word] |= (0x1 << bit);
574 }

576 
577 /* The following functions are from mmwavelib with additional output noise buffer.*/
578 
579 /*!*****************************************************************************************************************
580  * \brief
581  * Function Name : CFARCADSP_cfarCadBwrap
582  *
583  * \par
584  * <b>Description</b> : Performs a CFAR on an 16-bit unsigned input vector (CFAR-CA). The input values are assumed to be
585  * in lograthimic scale. So the comparision between the CUT and the noise samples is additive
586  * rather than multiplicative. Comparison is two-sided (wrap around when needed) for all CUTs.
587  *
588  * @param[in] inp : input array (16 bit unsigned numbers)
589  * @param[out] out : output array with indices of detected peaks (zero based counting)
590  * @param[in] len : number of elements in input array
591  * @param[in] const1,const2 : used to compare the Cell Under Test (CUT) to the sum of the noise cells:
592  * [noise sum /(2^(const2))] +const1 for two sided comparison.
593  * @param[in] guardLen : one sided guard length
594  * @param[in] noiseLen : one sided Noise length
595  *
596  * @param[out] noise : output array with each detected peak's noise floor (noise sum /(2^(const2)))
597  *
598  * @return Number of detected peaks (i.e length of out)
599  *
600  * @pre Input (inp) and Output (out) arrays are non-aliased.
601  * @ingroup DPU_CFARCAPROC_INTERNAL_FUNCTION
602  *
603  * Cycles (cgt 8.1.3) 4*len + 169
604  *******************************************************************************************************************
605  */
606 static uint32_t CFARCADSP_cfarCadBwrap(const uint16_t inp[restrict],
607  uint16_t out[restrict], uint32_t len,
608  uint32_t const1, uint32_t const2,
609  uint32_t guardLen, uint32_t noiseLen,
610  uint16_t noise[restrict])
611 {
612  uint32_t idx, idxLeftNext, idxLeftPrev, idxRightNext, idxRightPrev, outIdx;
613  uint32_t idxCUT;
614  uint32_t sum, sumLeft, sumRight;
615 
616  /*initializations */
617  outIdx = 0U;
618  sumLeft = 0U;
619  sumRight = 0U;
620  for (idx = 1U; idx <= noiseLen; idx++)
621  {
622  sumLeft += inp[len - guardLen - idx];
623  }
624 
625  for (idx = 1U; idx <= noiseLen; idx++)
626  {
627  sumRight += inp[idx + guardLen];
628  }
629 
630  /*CUT 0: */
631  sum = sumLeft + sumRight;
632  if ((uint32_t) inp[0] > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
633  {
634  out[outIdx] = 0U;
635  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
636  outIdx++;
637  }
638 
639  /* CUT 1 to guardLen: */
640  idxLeftPrev = len - guardLen - noiseLen; /*e.g. 32-4-8 = 20 */
641  idxLeftNext = idxLeftPrev + noiseLen; /*e.g. 28 */
642  idxRightPrev = 1U + guardLen; /*e.g. 1+4=5 */
643  idxRightNext = idxRightPrev + noiseLen; /*e.g. 13 */
644  for (idxCUT = 1U; idxCUT <= guardLen; idxCUT++)
645  {
646  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
647  idxLeftNext++;
648  idxLeftPrev++;
649  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
650  idxRightNext++;
651  idxRightPrev++;
652  sum = sumLeft + sumRight;
653  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
654  {
655  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
656  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
657  outIdx++;
658  }
659  }
660 
661  /* CUT guardLen+1 to guardLen+noiseLen: e.g. CUT 5 to 12 */
662  idxLeftNext = 0U;
663  for (idxCUT = (guardLen + 1U); idxCUT <= (guardLen + noiseLen);
664  idxCUT++)
665  {
666  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
667  idxLeftNext++;
668  idxLeftPrev++;
669  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
670  idxRightNext++;
671  idxRightPrev++;
672  sum = sumLeft + sumRight;
673  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
674  {
675  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
676  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
677  outIdx++;
678  }
679  }
680 
681  /* CUTs in the middle. e.g. CUT 13 to 19 */
682  idxLeftPrev = 0U;
683  for (idxCUT = (guardLen + noiseLen + 1U);
684  idxCUT < (len - (noiseLen + guardLen)); idxCUT++)
685  {
686  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
687  idxLeftNext++;
688  idxLeftPrev++;
689  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
690  idxRightNext++;
691  idxRightPrev++;
692  sum = sumLeft + sumRight; /*CFAR-CA */
693  /*sum=(sumLeft>sumRight)?sumLeft:sumRight;//CFAR-CA-GO */
694  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
695  {
696  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
697  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
698  outIdx++;
699  }
700  }
701 
702  /*********************************************************************************************/
703  /* noiseLen number of CUTs before the last guardLen CUTs. e.g. CUT 20 to 27 */
704  idxRightNext = 0U;
705  for (idxCUT = (len - (noiseLen + guardLen));
706  idxCUT < (len - guardLen); idxCUT++)
707  {
708  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
709  idxLeftNext++;
710  idxLeftPrev++;
711  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
712  idxRightNext++;
713  idxRightPrev++;
714  sum = sumLeft + sumRight;
715  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
716  {
717  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
718  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
719  outIdx++;
720  }
721  }
722 
723  /* The last guardLen number of CUTs */
724  idxRightPrev = 0U;
725  for (idxCUT = (len - guardLen); idxCUT < len; idxCUT++)
726  {
727  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
728  idxLeftNext++;
729  idxLeftPrev++;
730  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
731  idxRightNext++;
732  idxRightPrev++;
733  sum = sumLeft + sumRight;
734  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
735  {
736  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
737  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
738  outIdx++;
739  }
740  }
741 
742  return (outIdx);
743 
744 } /* CFARCADSP_cfarCadBwrap */
745 
746 
747 /*!*****************************************************************************************************************
748  * \brief
749  * Function Name : CFARCADSP_cfarCadB_SOGO
750  *
751  * \par
752  * <b>Description</b> : Performs a CFAR on an 16-bit unsigned input vector. The input values are assumed to be
753  * in lograthimic scale. So the comparision between the CUT and the noise samples is additive
754  * rather than multiplicative. Supports CA, CA SO, and CA GO.
755  *
756  * @param[in] inp : input array (16 bit unsigned numbers)
757  * @param[in] out : output array (indices of detected peaks (zero based counting))
758  * @param[in] len : number of elements in input array
759  * @param[in] cfartype : type of noise floor calculation when two sides of noise available.
760  * CFAR_CA; use sum of both sides then average.
761  * CFAR_CASO; use smaller of the left and right side.
762  * CFAR_CAGO; use greater of the left and right side.
763  * @param[in] const1,const2 : used to compare the Cell Under Test (CUT) to the sum of the noise cells:
764  * [noise sum /(2^(const2-1))]+const1 for one sided comparison
765  * (at the begining and end of the input vector).
766  * [noise sum /(2^(const2))]+const1 for two sided comparison
767  * @param[in] guardLen : one sided guard length
768  * @param[in] noiseLen : one sided noise length
769  *
770  * @param[out] noise : output array with each detected peak's noise floor estimate
771  *
772  * @return Number of detected peaks (i.e length of out)
773  *
774  * @pre Input (inp) and Output (out, noise) arrays are non-aliased.
775  * @ingroup DPU_CFARCAPROC_INTERNAL_FUNCTION
776  *
777  * Cycles (cgt 8.1.3) type CA: 4*len +111; type CASO: 4*len +114; type CAGO: 4*len +108
778  *******************************************************************************************************************
779  */
780 static uint32_t CFARCADSP_cfarCadB_SOGO(const uint16_t inp[restrict],
781  uint16_t out[restrict], uint32_t len,
782  uint16_t cfartype,
783  uint32_t const1, uint32_t const2,
784  uint32_t guardLen, uint32_t noiseLen,
785  uint16_t noise[restrict])
786 {
787  uint32_t idx, idxLeftNext, idxLeftPrev, idxRightNext,
788  idxRightPrev, outIdx, idxCUT;
789  uint32_t sum, sumLeft, sumRight;
790 
791  /* initializations */
792  outIdx = 0;
793  sumLeft = 0;
794  sumRight = 0;
795  for (idx = 0; idx < noiseLen; idx++)
796  {
797  sumRight += inp[idx + guardLen + 1U];
798  }
799 
800  /*********************************************************************************************/
801  /* One-sided comparision for the first segment (for the first noiseLen+gaurdLen samples */
802  idxCUT = 0;
803  if ((uint32_t) inp[idxCUT] > ((sumRight >> (const2 - 1U)) + const1))
804  {
805  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
806  noise[outIdx] = sumRight >> (const2-1U);
807  outIdx++;
808  }
809  idxCUT++;
810 
811  idxLeftNext = 0;
812  idxRightPrev = idxCUT + guardLen;
813  idxRightNext = idxRightPrev + noiseLen;
814  for (idx = 0; idx < (noiseLen + guardLen - 1U); idx++)
815  {
816  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
817  idxRightNext++;
818  idxRightPrev++;
819 
820  if (idx < noiseLen)
821  {
822  sumLeft += inp[idxLeftNext];
823  idxLeftNext++;
824  }
825 
826  if ((uint32_t) inp[idxCUT] > ((sumRight >> (const2 - 1U)) + const1))
827  {
828  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
829  noise[outIdx] = sumRight >> (const2-1U);
830  outIdx++;
831  }
832  idxCUT++;
833  }
834 
835  /*********************************************************************************************/
836  /* Two-sided comparision for the middle segment */
837  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
838  idxRightNext++;
839  idxRightPrev++;
840 
841  if (cfartype == CFAR_CA)
842  {
843  sum = sumRight + sumLeft;
844  if ((uint32_t) inp[idxCUT] > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
845  {
846  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
847  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
848  outIdx++;
849  }
850  idxCUT++;
851 
852  idxLeftPrev = 0;
853  for (idx = 0; idx < (len - 2U*(noiseLen + guardLen) - 1U); idx++)
854  {
855  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
856  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
857  idxLeftNext++;
858  idxLeftPrev++;
859  idxRightNext++;
860  idxRightPrev++;
861  sum = sumLeft + sumRight;
862 
863  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> const2) + const1))
864  {
865  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
866  noise[outIdx] = sum >> const2;
867  outIdx++;
868  }
869  idxCUT++;
870  }
871  } /*CFAR_CA*/
872  else if (cfartype == CFAR_CASO)
873  {
874  sum = (sumLeft < sumRight) ? sumLeft:sumRight;
875  if ((uint32_t) inp[idxCUT] > ((sum >> (const2-1U)) + const1))
876  {
877  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
878  noise[outIdx] = sum >> (const2-1U);
879  outIdx++;
880  }
881  idxCUT++;
882 
883  idxLeftPrev = 0;
884  for (idx = 0; idx < (len - 2U*(noiseLen + guardLen) - 1U); idx++)
885  {
886  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
887  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
888  idxLeftNext++;
889  idxLeftPrev++;
890  idxRightNext++;
891  idxRightPrev++;
892 
893  sum = (sumLeft < sumRight) ? sumLeft:sumRight;
894 
895  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> (const2-1U)) + const1))
896  {
897  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
898  noise[outIdx] = sum >> (const2-1U);
899  outIdx++;
900  }
901  idxCUT++;
902  }
903  } /*CFAR_CASO*/
904  else /*CFAR_CAGO*/
905  {
906  sum = (sumLeft > sumRight) ? sumLeft:sumRight;
907  if ((uint32_t) inp[idxCUT] > ((sum >> (const2-1U)) + const1))
908  {
909  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
910  noise[outIdx] = sum >> (const2-1U);
911  outIdx++;
912  }
913  idxCUT++;
914 
915  idxLeftPrev = 0;
916  sum = sumLeft + sumRight;
917  for (idx = 0; idx < (len - 2U*(noiseLen + guardLen) - 1U); idx++)
918  {
919  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
920  sumRight = (sumRight + inp[idxRightNext]) - inp[idxRightPrev];
921  idxLeftNext++;
922  idxLeftPrev++;
923  idxRightNext++;
924  idxRightPrev++;
925 
926  sum = (sumLeft > sumRight) ? sumLeft:sumRight;
927 
928  if ((uint32_t) (inp[idxCUT]) > ((sum >> (const2-1U)) + const1))
929  {
930  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
931  noise[outIdx] = sum >> (const2-1U);
932  outIdx++;
933  }
934  idxCUT++;
935  }
936  } /*CFAR_CAGO*/
937 
938  /*********************************************************************************************/
939  /* One-sided comparision for the last segment (for the last noiseLen+gaurdLen samples) */
940  for (idx = 0; idx < (noiseLen + guardLen); idx++)
941  {
942  sumLeft = (sumLeft + inp[idxLeftNext]) - inp[idxLeftPrev];
943  idxLeftNext++;
944  idxLeftPrev++;
945  if ((uint32_t) inp[idxCUT] > ((sumLeft >> (const2 - 1U)) + const1))
946  {
947  out[outIdx] = (uint16_t)idxCUT;
948  noise[outIdx] = sumLeft >> (const2-1U);
949  outIdx++;
950  }
951  idxCUT++;
952  }
953  /*********************************************************************************************/
954 
955  return (outIdx);
956 
957 } /* CFARCADSP_cfarCadB_SOGO */
958 
973 static uint32_t CFARCADSP_peakGrouping
974 (
975  CFARCADspObj *cfarObj,
976  uint16_t numDetectedObjs
977 )
978 {
979  uint16_t detIdx;
980  uint16_t numPeakGrp = 0;
981  uint16_t index;
982  uint8_t scheme;
983 
984  if(cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.peakGroupingEn)
985  {
986  scheme = cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.peakGroupingScheme;
987  }
988  else
989  {
990  scheme = cfarObj->cfarCfgDoppler.peakGroupingScheme;
991  }
992 
993  if (scheme == DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_CFAR_PEAK_BASED)
994  {
995  numPeakGrp = mmwavelib_cfarPeakQualifiedInOrderPruning(cfarObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf, /* output the peak index after the group */
996  cfarObj->detObjRangeIdxBuf, /* raw detection range index */
997  cfarObj->detObjDopplerIdxBuf, /* raw detection doppler index */
998  cfarObj->detObjPeakValBuf, /* raw detection peak value */
999  numDetectedObjs, /* number of raw detection peaks */
1000  cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins, /* number of doppler bins */
1001  cfarObj->fovRange.maxIdx, /* maximum range bin */
1002  cfarObj->fovRange.minIdx, /* minimum range bin */
1003  cfarObj->cfarCfgDoppler.peakGroupingEn, /* doppler direction group */
1004  cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.peakGroupingEn, /* range direction group */
1005  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrListSize/* maximum grouped peaks */
1006  );
1007 
1008  }
1009  else if (scheme == DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_DET_MATRIX_BASED)
1010  {
1011  numPeakGrp = mmwavelib_cfarPeakPruning (cfarObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf,
1012  cfarObj->detObjRangeIdxBuf, /* raw detection range index */
1013  cfarObj->detObjDopplerIdxBuf, /* raw detection doppler index */
1014  numDetectedObjs,
1015  (uint16_t *)cfarObj->res.detMatrix.data,
1016  cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins, /* number of doppler bins */
1017  cfarObj->fovRange.maxIdx, /* maximum range bin */
1018  cfarObj->fovRange.minIdx, /* minimum range bin */
1019  cfarObj->cfarCfgDoppler.peakGroupingEn, /* doppler direction group */
1020  cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.peakGroupingEn, /* range direction group */
1021  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrListSize);
1022  }
1023  else
1024  {
1025  numPeakGrp = numDetectedObjs;
1026  }
1027 
1028  /* Based on the detObjPeakIdxBuf, construct detection list */
1029  for (index = 0; index < numPeakGrp; index ++)
1030  {
1031  float snrdB;
1032 
1033  detIdx = cfarObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf[index];
1034  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[index].rangeIdx = cfarObj->detObjRangeIdxBuf[detIdx];
1035  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[index].dopplerIdx = cfarObj->detObjDopplerIdxBuf[detIdx];
1036  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[index].noise = cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[detIdx].noise;
1037  snrdB = CFARCADSP_CONV_PEAK_TO_LOG((float)cfarObj->detObjPeakValBuf[detIdx], DPIF_DETMATRIX_DATA_QFORMAT) -
1038  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[index].noise;
1039  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[index].snr = (int16_t)snrdB;
1040  }
1041 
1042  return(numPeakGrp);
1043 }
1044 
1061 static int32_t CFARCADSP_processDopplerDomain
1062 (
1063  CFARCADspObj *cfarObj,
1064  uint8_t peakGrpingEn,
1065  uint32_t *waitingTime,
1066  int32_t *errCode
1067 )
1068 {
1069  uint32_t numDetObjPerCfar;
1070  uint32_t numDetObjDoppler = 0U;
1071  uint32_t detIndex;
1072  uint16_t rangeIdx;
1073  volatile uint32_t startTimeWait;
1074 
1075  /* Trigger both ping and pong channel */
1076  if ((*errCode = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(cfarObj->res.edmaHandle, cfarObj->res.edmaInPing.channel)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1077  {
1078  goto exit;
1079  }
1080  if ((*errCode = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(cfarObj->res.edmaHandle, cfarObj->res.edmaInPong.channel)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1081  {
1082  goto exit;
1083  }
1084 
1085  memset (cfarObj->res.cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask, 0x0, cfarObj->res.cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskSize * sizeof(uint32_t));
1086 
1087  /* Loop through all range bins for CFAR detection */
1088  rangeIdx = 0;
1089  do
1090  {
1091  uint16_t *currDetMatrixBuffer;
1092  uint8_t edmaChannel;
1093 
1094  if(rangeIdx %2 == 0)
1095  {
1096  edmaChannel = cfarObj->res.edmaInPing.channel;
1097  }
1098  else
1099  {
1100  edmaChannel = cfarObj->res.edmaInPong.channel;
1101  }
1102 
1103  /* Calculate current local buffer base address */
1104  currDetMatrixBuffer = &cfarObj->res.localDetMatrixBuffer[cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins * (rangeIdx % 2)];
1105 
1106  /* Wait for EDMA transfer of current range line to complete */
1107  startTimeWait = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
1108  CFARCADSP_waitEDMATransComplete(cfarObj->res.edmaHandle, edmaChannel);
1109  *waitingTime += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTimeWait;
1110 
1111  /* CFAR-detecton on range line: search doppler peak among numDopplerBins samples */
1112  numDetObjPerCfar = CFARCADSP_cfarCadBwrap(
1113  currDetMatrixBuffer,
1114  cfarObj->res.cfarDetOutBuffer,
1115  cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins,
1116  cfarObj->cfarCfgDoppler.thresholdScale,
1117  cfarObj->cfarCfgDoppler.noiseDivShift,
1118  cfarObj->cfarCfgDoppler.guardLen,
1119  cfarObj->cfarCfgDoppler.winLen,
1120  cfarObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf);
1121 
1122  for (detIndex = 0; detIndex < numDetObjPerCfar; detIndex++)
1123  {
1124  uint16_t dopplerIndex;
1125  float noisedB;
1126  dopplerIndex = cfarObj->res.cfarDetOutBuffer[detIndex];
1127 
1128  /* Update detection bit mask */
1129  CFARCADSP_setCfarDetMaskLine(rangeIdx, dopplerIndex, cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins, cfarObj->res.cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask);
1130 
1131  /* Calculate noise and snr */
1132  noisedB = CFARCADSP_CONV_PEAK_TO_LOG((float)cfarObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf[detIndex], DPIF_DETMATRIX_DATA_QFORMAT);
1133 
1134  if (cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.thresholdScale > 0)
1135  {
1136  /* If RangeDomain CFAR is enabld, no need to save detected objects */
1137  }
1138  else
1139  {
1140  if(peakGrpingEn)
1141  {
1142  cfarObj->detObjRangeIdxBuf[numDetObjDoppler] = rangeIdx;
1143  cfarObj->detObjDopplerIdxBuf[numDetObjDoppler] = dopplerIndex;
1144  cfarObj->detObjPeakValBuf[numDetObjDoppler] = currDetMatrixBuffer[dopplerIndex];
1145  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjDoppler].noise = (int16_t)noisedB;
1146  }
1147  else
1148  {
1149  float snrdB;
1150  snrdB = CFARCADSP_CONV_PEAK_TO_LOG((float)currDetMatrixBuffer[dopplerIndex], DPIF_DETMATRIX_DATA_QFORMAT) - noisedB;
1151 
1152  /* Update detection list */
1153  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjDoppler].rangeIdx = rangeIdx;
1154  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjDoppler].dopplerIdx= dopplerIndex;
1155  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjDoppler].snr = snrdB;
1156  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjDoppler].noise = (int16_t)noisedB;
1157  }
1158 
1159  numDetObjDoppler ++;
1160  if(numDetObjDoppler >= cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrListSize)
1161  {
1162  /* Output is limited by cfarRngDopSnrList size */
1163  goto exit;
1164  }
1165  }
1166  }
1167  rangeIdx++;
1168 
1169  /* Trigger next EDMA if it is not the last range Bins */
1170  if(rangeIdx < (cfarObj->staticCfg.numRangeBins - 1))
1171  {
1172  if ((*errCode = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(cfarObj->res.edmaHandle, edmaChannel)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1173  {
1174  goto exit;
1175  }
1176  }
1177  }while(rangeIdx < cfarObj->staticCfg.numRangeBins);
1178 exit:
1179  return numDetObjDoppler;
1180 }
1181 
1198 static int32_t CFARCADSP_processRangeDomain
1199 (
1200  CFARCADspObj *cfarObj,
1201  uint8_t peakGrpingEn,
1202  uint32_t *waitingTime,
1203  uint32_t numDetObjDoppler
1204 )
1205 {
1206  uint32_t detIdx;
1207  uint32_t numDetObjIndex = 0;
1208  volatile uint32_t startTimeWait;
1209  uint32_t dopplerLine;
1210  uint32_t numDetObj;
1211  uint32_t srcAddr;
1212  uint32_t localBufferAddr;
1213  uint16_t loopIndex = 0;
1214  uint16_t oneDopplerBinSize;
1215  int16_t dopplerSgnIdx;
1216 
1217  oneDopplerBinSize = cfarObj->staticCfg.numRangeBins * sizeof(uint16_t);
1218 
1219  /* Starting from first dopplerLine */
1220  dopplerLine = 0;
1221 
1222  do
1223  {
1224  /* Check if any bits are set for a particular doppler line */
1225  if(CFARCADSP_isObjectDetectedOnDopplerLine(dopplerLine,
1226  cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins,
1227  cfarObj->staticCfg.numRangeBins,
1228  cfarObj->res.cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask) == false)
1229  {
1230  /* No objects are found on doppler line , skip to next doppler line */
1231  dopplerLine++;
1232  continue;
1233  }
1234 
1235  dopplerSgnIdx = dopplerLine;
1236  if (dopplerSgnIdx >= (int32_t)(cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins>>1))
1237  {
1238  dopplerSgnIdx = dopplerSgnIdx - (int32_t)cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins;
1239  }
1240 
1241  /* Calculate source address in detMatrix for a doppler Line with detected objects */
1242  srcAddr = dopplerLine*sizeof(uint16_t) + (uint32_t)cfarObj->res.detMatrix.data;
1243 
1244  /* When loopIndex is even, use Ping buffer. Otherwise use pong buffer */
1245  localBufferAddr = (uint32_t)cfarObj->res.localDetMatrixBuffer + (loopIndex %2) *oneDopplerBinSize;
1246 
1247  /* Setup EDMA to bring in detection matrix for the dopplerLine */
1248  CFARCADSP_configEDMARangeDomain(cfarObj->res.edmaHandle,
1249  &cfarObj->res.edmaInPing,
1250  &cfarObj->staticCfg,
1251  srcAddr,
1252  localBufferAddr);
1253 
1254  if (( EDMA_startDmaTransfer(cfarObj->res.edmaHandle, cfarObj->res.edmaInPing.channel)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1255  {
1256  goto exit;
1257  }
1258 
1259  /* Wait for DMA transfer of current dopple line to complete */
1260  startTimeWait = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
1261  CFARCADSP_waitEDMATransComplete(cfarObj->res.edmaHandle, cfarObj->res.edmaInPing.channel);
1262  *waitingTime += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTimeWait;
1263 
1264  /* Do CFAR search for range peak among numRangeBins samples for the doppler line*/
1265  numDetObj = CFARCADSP_cfarCadB_SOGO(
1266  (uint16_t *)localBufferAddr,
1267  cfarObj->res.cfarDetOutBuffer,
1268  cfarObj->staticCfg.numRangeBins,
1269  cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.averageMode,
1270  cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.thresholdScale,
1271  cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.noiseDivShift,
1272  cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.guardLen,
1273  cfarObj->cfarCfgRange.winLen,
1274  cfarObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf);
1275 
1276  for(detIdx=0; detIdx <numDetObj; detIdx++)
1277  {
1278  if (numDetObjIndex < cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrListSize)
1279  {
1280  uint16_t rangeIdx;
1281  uint16_t *cfarDetList = (uint16_t *)cfarObj->res.cfarDetOutBuffer;
1282  uint16_t *detMat = (uint16_t *)localBufferAddr;
1283 
1284  rangeIdx = cfarDetList[detIdx];
1285 
1286  /* Is the object in Doppler Domain as well? */
1287  if(CFARCADSP_isObjectDetected( rangeIdx,
1288  dopplerLine,
1289  cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins,
1290  cfarObj->res.cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask) == false)
1291  {
1292  /* Object is not detected in Doppler domain, continue for next detected objects */
1293  continue;
1294  }
1295 
1296  if ((rangeIdx >= cfarObj->fovRange.minIdx) &&
1297  (rangeIdx <= cfarObj->fovRange.maxIdx) &&
1298  (dopplerSgnIdx >= cfarObj->fovDoppler.minIdx) &&
1299  (dopplerSgnIdx <= cfarObj->fovDoppler.maxIdx))
1300  {
1301  float noisedB;
1302 
1303  /* Calculate noise */
1304  noisedB = CFARCADSP_CONV_PEAK_TO_LOG((float)cfarObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf[detIdx], DPIF_DETMATRIX_DATA_QFORMAT);
1305  if(peakGrpingEn)
1306  {
1307  cfarObj->detObjRangeIdxBuf[numDetObjIndex] = rangeIdx;
1308  cfarObj->detObjDopplerIdxBuf[numDetObjIndex] = dopplerLine;
1309  cfarObj->detObjPeakValBuf[numDetObjIndex] = detMat[rangeIdx];
1310  }
1311  else
1312  {
1313  float snrdB;
1314 
1315  snrdB = CFARCADSP_CONV_PEAK_TO_LOG((float)detMat[rangeIdx], DPIF_DETMATRIX_DATA_QFORMAT) - noisedB;
1316 
1317  /* Update detection list */
1318  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjIndex].rangeIdx = rangeIdx;
1319  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjIndex].dopplerIdx = dopplerLine;
1320  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjIndex].snr = (int16_t)snrdB;
1321  }
1322  cfarObj->res.cfarRngDopSnrList[numDetObjIndex].noise = (int16_t)noisedB;
1323 
1324  numDetObjIndex++;
1325  }
1326  }
1327  else
1328  {
1329  break;
1330  }
1331  }
1332 
1333  /* Current doppler line is completed , move on to next doppler line */
1334  loopIndex++;
1335  dopplerLine++;
1336  }while(dopplerLine<cfarObj->staticCfg.numDopplerBins);
1337 exit:
1338  return(numDetObjIndex);
1339 }
1340 
1341 /**************************************************************************
1342  **************************** External Functions *******************************
1343  **************************************************************************/
1344 
1360 DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Handle DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_init
1361 (
1362  int32_t* errCode
1363 )
1364 {
1365  CFARCADspObj *cfarDspObj = NULL;
1366  *errCode = 0;
1367 
1368  cfarDspObj = MemoryP_ctrlAlloc(sizeof(CFARCADspObj), 0);
1369  if (cfarDspObj == NULL)
1370  {
1371  *errCode = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEM;
1372  goto exit;
1373  }
1374 
1375  /* Initialize memory */
1376  memset((void *)cfarDspObj, 0, sizeof(CFARCADspObj));
1377 
1378 exit:
1379  return ((DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Handle)cfarDspObj);
1380 }
1381 
1400 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_config
1401 (
1402  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Handle handle,
1403  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Config *cfarcaCfg
1404 )
1405 {
1406  int32_t retVal = 0;
1407  CFARCADspObj *cfarDspObj = (CFARCADspObj *)handle;
1408  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_HW_Resources *pRes = &cfarcaCfg->res;
1409  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_StaticConfig *staticCfg = &cfarcaCfg->staticCfg;
1410 
1411  if(cfarDspObj == NULL)
1412  {
1413  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1414  goto exit;
1415  }
1416 
1417  /* Validate buffer pointer */
1418  if( (pRes->localDetMatrixBuffer == NULL) ||
1419  (pRes->cfarDetOutBuffer == NULL) ||
1420  (pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask == NULL) ||
1421  (pRes->cfarRngDopSnrList == NULL) ||
1422  (pRes->detMatrix.data == NULL))
1423  {
1424  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL_EBUFFER_POINTER;
1425  goto exit;
1426  }
1427 
1428  /* Check if detection matrix format is supported. */
1429  if(pRes->detMatrix.datafmt != DPIF_DETMATRIX_FORMAT_1)
1430  {
1431  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL__DET_MATRIX_FORMAT;
1432  goto exit;
1433  }
1434 
1435  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->detMatrix.data,
1436  DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_DET_MATRIX_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1437  {
1438  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEMALIGN_DET_MATRIX;
1439  goto exit;
1440  }
1441 
1442  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->cfarRngDopSnrList,
1443  DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_CFAR_DET_LIST_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1444  {
1445  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEMALIGN_CFAR_DET_LIST;
1446  goto exit;
1447  }
1448 
1449  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask,
1450  DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_DOPPLER_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1451  {
1452  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEMALIGN_DOPPLER_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK;
1453  goto exit;
1454  }
1455 
1456  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->localDetMatrixBuffer,
1457  DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_DET_MATRIX_LOCAL_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1458  {
1459  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEMALIGN_LOCAL_DETMATRIX;
1460  goto exit;
1461  }
1462 
1463  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->cfarDetOutBuffer,
1464  DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_CFAR_DETOUT_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1465  {
1466  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEMALIGN_LOCAL_CFAR_DETOUT;
1467  goto exit;
1468  }
1469 
1470  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(pRes->cfarScrachBuffer,
1471  DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_SCRACHBUF_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1472  {
1473  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEMALIGN_SCRATCH_BUFFER;
1474  goto exit;
1475  }
1476 
1477  /* Check if input scratch memory for bit mask is sufficient */
1478  if ((pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskSize * 32U) <
1479  (staticCfg->numDopplerBins * staticCfg->numRangeBins))
1480  {
1481  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEM__INSUFFICIENT_DOP_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK;
1482  goto exit;
1483  }
1484 
1485  /* Validating buffer size */
1486  if( (pRes->localDetMatrixBufferSize < MAX(staticCfg->numDopplerBins, staticCfg->numRangeBins) * sizeof(uint16_t) * 2U) ||
1487  (pRes->cfarDetOutBufferSize < MAX(staticCfg->numDopplerBins, staticCfg->numRangeBins) * sizeof(uint16_t)) ||
1488  (pRes->detMatrix.dataSize < staticCfg->numRangeBins * staticCfg->numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t)))
1489  {
1490  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL_EBUFFER_SIZE;
1491  goto exit;
1492  }
1493 
1494  /* Validate peak grouping parameters */
1495  if(((cfarcaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgRange->peakGroupingEn) &&
1496  (cfarcaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgRange->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_DET_MATRIX_BASED)) &&
1497  (cfarcaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgRange->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_CFAR_PEAK_BASED))
1498  {
1499  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1500  goto exit;
1501  }
1502 
1503  if(((cfarcaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgDoppler->peakGroupingEn) &&
1504  (cfarcaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgDoppler->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_DET_MATRIX_BASED)) &&
1505  (cfarcaCfg->dynCfg.cfarCfgDoppler->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_CFAR_PEAK_BASED))
1506  {
1507  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1508  goto exit;
1509  }
1510 
1511  CFARCADSP_saveConfiguration(cfarDspObj, cfarcaCfg);
1512 
1513  /* The scrach buffer will be used for peak grouping and cfar noise buffer */
1514  if((pRes->cfarScrachBuffer == NULL) ||
1515  (pRes->cfarScrachBufferSize < pRes->cfarRngDopSnrListSize * sizeof(uint16_t) * 4U ))
1516  {
1517  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_ENOMEM__INSUFFICIENT_SCRATCH_BUFFER;
1518  goto exit;
1519  }
1520  else
1521  {
1522  /* Internal scratch buffers for peak grouping and noise value */
1523  cfarDspObj->detObjRangeIdxBuf = (uint16_t *)pRes->cfarScrachBuffer;
1524  cfarDspObj->detObjDopplerIdxBuf = (uint16_t *)((uint32_t)pRes->cfarScrachBuffer + pRes->cfarRngDopSnrListSize * sizeof(uint16_t));
1525  cfarDspObj->detObjPeakValBuf = (uint16_t *)((uint32_t)cfarDspObj->detObjDopplerIdxBuf + pRes->cfarRngDopSnrListSize * sizeof(uint16_t));
1526  cfarDspObj->detObjPeakIdxBuf = (uint16_t *)((uint32_t)cfarDspObj->detObjPeakValBuf + pRes->cfarRngDopSnrListSize * sizeof(uint16_t));
1527  }
1528 
1529 exit:
1530  return retVal;
1531 }
1532 
1550 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_process
1551 (
1552  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Handle handle,
1553  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_OutParams *outParams
1554 )
1555 {
1556  uint16_t numObjs = 0;
1557  int32_t retVal = 0;
1558  CFARCADspObj *cfarDspObj;
1559  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_HW_Resources *pRes;
1560  volatile uint32_t startTime;
1561  uint32_t waitTimeLocal = 0;
1562  uint8_t peakGrpingEn = 0;
1563 
1564  if (handle == NULL)
1565  {
1566  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1567  goto exit;
1568  }
1569 
1570  cfarDspObj = (CFARCADspObj *)handle;
1571  pRes = &cfarDspObj->res;
1572 
1573  if ( (cfarDspObj->cfarCfgRange.peakGroupingEn) || (cfarDspObj->cfarCfgDoppler.peakGroupingEn))
1574  {
1575  peakGrpingEn = 1;
1576  }
1577  startTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
1578 
1579  /* CFARCA Peak search along doppler line */
1580  if (cfarDspObj->cfarCfgDoppler.thresholdScale > 0)
1581  {
1582  /* Configure EDMA */
1583  retVal = CFARCADSP_configEDMADopplerDomain(pRes, &cfarDspObj->staticCfg);
1584  if (retVal != 0)
1585  {
1586  goto exit;
1587  }
1588 
1589  numObjs = CFARCADSP_processDopplerDomain(cfarDspObj, peakGrpingEn, &waitTimeLocal, &retVal);
1590  }
1591  else
1592  {
1593  /* All bit mask is masked in case of no-doppler domain detection */
1594  memset((void *)pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask, 0xFF, pRes->cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskSize * sizeof(uint32_t));
1595  }
1596 
1597  /* CFARCA Peak search along range line*/
1598  if (cfarDspObj->cfarCfgRange.thresholdScale > 0)
1599  {
1600  numObjs = CFARCADSP_processRangeDomain(cfarDspObj, peakGrpingEn, &waitTimeLocal, numObjs);
1601  }
1602 
1603  if (numObjs > pRes->cfarRngDopSnrListSize)
1604  {
1605  numObjs = pRes->cfarRngDopSnrListSize;
1606  }
1607 
1608  /* CFARCA peak Grouping */
1609  if ( (cfarDspObj->cfarCfgRange.peakGroupingEn) || (cfarDspObj->cfarCfgDoppler.peakGroupingEn))
1610  {
1611  numObjs = CFARCADSP_peakGrouping(cfarDspObj, numObjs);
1612  }
1613 
1614  cfarDspObj->numProcess++;
1615 
1616  outParams->numCfarDetectedPoints = numObjs;
1617  outParams->stats.waitTime = waitTimeLocal;
1618  outParams->stats.processingTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime - waitTimeLocal;
1619  outParams->stats.numProcess = cfarDspObj->numProcess;
1620 exit:
1621  return (retVal);
1622 }
1623 
1643 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_control
1644 (
1645  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Handle handle,
1646  DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Cmd cmd,
1647  void *arg,
1648  uint32_t argSize
1649 )
1650 {
1651  int32_t retVal = 0;
1652  CFARCADspObj *cfarDspObj = (CFARCADspObj *)handle;
1653 
1654  /* Get rangeProc data object */
1655  if (cfarDspObj == NULL)
1656  {
1657  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1658  goto exit;
1659  }
1660 
1661  switch(cmd)
1662  {
1663  case DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Cmd_CfarRangeCfg:
1664  {
1665  DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg *cfarcaCfg = arg;
1666  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg)) ||
1667  (arg == NULL))
1668  {
1669  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1670  goto exit;
1671  }
1672  else if( (cfarcaCfg->peakGroupingEn) &&
1673  ((cfarcaCfg->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_DET_MATRIX_BASED) &&
1674  (cfarcaCfg->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_CFAR_PEAK_BASED)))
1675  {
1676  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1677  goto exit;
1678  }
1679  else
1680  {
1681  /* Save configuration */
1682  memcpy((void *)&cfarDspObj->cfarCfgRange, arg, argSize);
1683  CFARCADSP_adjustCfarCfg(&cfarDspObj->cfarCfgRange);
1684  }
1685  }
1686  break;
1687  case DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Cmd_CfarDopplerCfg:
1688  {
1689  DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg *cfarcaCfg = arg;
1690  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg)) ||
1691  (arg == NULL))
1692  {
1693  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1694  goto exit;
1695  }
1696  else if( (cfarcaCfg->peakGroupingEn) &&
1697  ((cfarcaCfg->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_DET_MATRIX_BASED) &&
1698  (cfarcaCfg->peakGroupingScheme != DPU_CFAR_PEAK_GROUPING_CFAR_PEAK_BASED)))
1699  {
1700  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1701  goto exit;
1702  }
1703  else
1704  {
1705  /* Save configuration */
1706  memcpy((void *)&cfarDspObj->cfarCfgDoppler, arg, argSize);
1707  /* DPU assumes that Doppler is always CFAR-CA but following code
1708  is added for generality */
1709  CFARCADSP_adjustCfarCfg(&cfarDspObj->cfarCfgDoppler);
1710  }
1711  }
1712  break;
1713  case DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Cmd_FovRangeCfg:
1714  {
1715  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg)) ||
1716  (arg == NULL))
1717  {
1718  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1719  goto exit;
1720  }
1721  else
1722  {
1723  /* Save configuration */
1724  CFARCADSP_fovConvertRange(arg,
1725  cfarDspObj->staticCfg.rangeStep,
1726  &cfarDspObj->fovRange);
1727  }
1728  }
1729  break;
1730  case DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Cmd_FovDopplerCfg:
1731  {
1732  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_CFARCAProc_FovCfg)) ||
1733  (arg == NULL))
1734  {
1735  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1736  goto exit;
1737  }
1738  else
1739  {
1740  /* Save configuration */
1741  CFARCADSP_fovConvertDoppler(arg,
1742  cfarDspObj->staticCfg.dopplerStep,
1743  &cfarDspObj->fovDoppler);
1744  }
1745  }
1746  break;
1747 
1748  default:
1749  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1750  break;
1751  }
1752 exit:
1753  return (retVal);
1754 }
1755 
1773 int32_t DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_deinit(DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_Handle handle)
1774 {
1775  int32_t retVal = 0;
1776  if (handle == NULL)
1777  {
1778  retVal = DPU_CFARCAPROCDSP_EINVAL;
1779  }
1780  else
1781  {
1782  MemoryP_ctrlFree(handle, sizeof(CFARCADspObj));
1783  }
1784  return (retVal);
1785 }
